definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: progeny, posterity, alw. c. [[נִין]] in standing phr. (Sir 41:5, Sir 47:22 c, both c. [[נין]]);—abs. [[בְּעַמּוֹ]] ´[[לאׁ נִין וְלאׁ נ]] Job 18:19, cf. [[שֵׁם]] ´[[וּשְׁאָר וְנִין וְנ]] Is 14:22; sf. [[לִי וּלְנִינִי וּלְנֶכְדִּי]] Ge 21:23 to me and to my offspring and to my posterity.
